text: Furthermore, sera were analyzed for neutralizing antibodies against FMDV (Table 2) . While the two control cattle could not develop any neutralization antibodies against FMDV, all five cattle vaccinated with Bm-P12A3C antigen developed a FMDV-specific neutralizing antibody response in 14pv and maintained at the same level or higher in 28 dpv. The result was in agreement with the LPBE-antibody titer.
